== Description ==

Determine if the given object type is associated with the given taxonomy.


== Usage ==

%%%is_object_in_taxonomy($object_type, $taxonomy);%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$object_type|string|Object type string}}

{{Parameter|$taxonomy|string|Single taxonomy name}}

== Return Values ==

; (bool) : True if object is associated with the taxonomy, otherwise false.

== Change Log ==

* Since: [[Version 3.0|3.0]]

== Source File ==

<code>is_object_in_taxonomy()</code> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/taxonomy.php}}.
